Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> On 04.12.2015, 01:59:18, ProtoJeb21 said:
> 
> 
> How has the development been going? It's been a month since the last status post...
> 

Well I'm realy buy with my mods...
Was a download ever issued for this?  I can't seem to find one.

Don't worry guys! I'm not dead - yet.

I have actually been working on custom textures using pixlr editor, which is an online texture editor.

I think the textures I've been working on are decent...

Anyway, I'm kinda back.

Also, does anyone know if Kopernicus works for the latest version of KSP?

(NOT A NECROPOST - Just an update)

EDIT: Kopernicus does work with KSP 1.1.2

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-15T19:36:52Z" title="05/15/2016 07:36  PM" data-short="8 yr">May 15, 2016</time> by Astrofox**

in the things you want to add, it says binary objects. what you can do is have the smaller orbit toe larger like a stock system, then have sigma binary configs which will make them true binary systems.

Yeah, I've been working on it for a while, and I really haven't picked it back up until today. Hopefully the guys will help out with this.

BTW, the EVE mod has been changed quite a bit, and we actually may have to completely recompile the entire cloud coverings for the planets.

I will be back with more news as the development goes along.

Maybe I'll put up a download later on today or this week, but only if the stuff still works and that there are no tremendous bugs that would inhibit game-play.

So far, the only things we really need to fix (as I just checked) are:

-the rings (really too far into the planets/star... already working on it)

-Stars and their appearances (especially the pulsars and white dwarf)

-Sigma Binaries configs don't work anymore, and the bary-centers that show up are literally just the Mun.

- Clouds

- retexture for Kinern

-the true shape of some celestial bodies does not appear (MTM-3 Phoop is a good example)

- get better Normal maps for the bodies that don't have proper ones

- Vulkinar needs to be readjusted (I'll get on that)

- support for the [Galactic Neighborhood mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/116058-wip112-galactic-neighborhood/)

Maybe I will release the functional parts of the Exoplanet portion of the entire collection (I should really call it a collection of packs, shouldn't I?)

I am also kinda finished with a replica of the HD80606 system (well, only the star and exoplanet, not HD80607)

Anyway, if anyone is out there and has experience with several of these issues, please post to get my attention!

Ok, I've got Vulkinar's orbit into a decent place.

 Most of the rings are set up now, and I hope to put up the development download link up soon.

I have not looked at the celestial bodies up close, but whenever Hyperedit works for KSP 1.1.2 I will attempt to see if there are any bug lines, or unexpected stuff.

I found a mod called Sigma Binary! It helps do the calculations for binary planets/moon etc, heres the forum link [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127820](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127820) Might be a little helpful ( Sorry if someone already mentioned it I don't have time atm to read through all 23 pages )

- Light comes off several planets in the wrong direction (A Normal map issue)

- Sigma Binary configs need to be updated

- EVE configs need to be back to where they were when we left this pack off...

- Not even sure what else
